SummaryEnglish:
"Pucca" is a TV series based on a Flash animation series published by Vooz Character Systems.  It follows the trails and exploits of a South Korean girl named Pucca who is insanely in love with a prideful ninja named Garu.  Meanwhile, Garu and Pucca help their town of Sooga Village out when evil ninjas attack, as well as diffuse a lot of the absurd situations that frequently plague the town.  This show could best be described as a cleaned-up version of South Park meets Looney Tunes meets Naruto.  

There is some very subtly hidden adult humor; but most of the adult jokes would not go noticed by small children, who are the primary audience.

1.SummaryEnglish: Garu tries to save the village by stopping an erupting volcano.

2.SummaryEnglish: The chefs attempt to make a noodle that goes around the world.

3.SummaryEnglish: Garu and Abyo aim to win the ping-pong tournament, even against Tobe's tricks, although they might need a little help from Pucca.

4.SummaryEnglish: Tobe witnesses the magic powers of Won's eggs.

5.SummaryEnglish: The Chefs try to regain their honor while Pucca watches the restaurant.

6.SummaryEnglish: Pucca and her friends enter Garu's booby-trapped ninja house.

7.SummaryEnglish: Garu receives a cursed tie on his birthday.

8.SummaryEnglish: The Vagabonds cast a spell to give Garu chicken pox and make him act like a chicken, but it works too well, as everyone in Sooga Village catches chicken pox.

9.SummaryEnglish: Pucca gives Garu a giant flower that eats anything and anyone in sight.

10.SummaryEnglish: Garu shrinks himself to get away from Pucca, but being small puts him in even more trouble than he bargained for.

11.SummaryEnglish: The kite festival in Sooga Village goes haywire when Tobe & his gang show up.

12.SummaryEnglish: Abyo tries to make his acting debut and Pucca foils it by chasing Garu.

13.SummaryEnglish: It's Halloween until Pucca scares Garu's skeleton out of him and is on the run.

14.SummaryEnglish: A haunted picture with a ghost version of Pucca starts haunting Garu.

15.SummaryEnglish: Ching becomes evil from Doga's sock and blames her rampage on Pucca.

16.SummaryEnglish: Abyo and Garu are capture in a pocket change-eating sofa.

17.SummaryEnglish: Tobe and his ninjas plan to destroy Garu in a winter cold battle.

18.SummaryEnglish: It's Pucca's birthday until Garu tries to keep her busy.

19.SummaryEnglish: The citizens of Sooga Village have a Rickshaw race for a special prize.

20.SummaryEnglish: Pucca plans to marry Garu in the night mall.

21.SummaryEnglish: Garu and Abyo go on a fishing trip until a giant fish attacks them.

22.SummaryEnglish: Pucca dreams about Garu until Tobe starts turning it into a nightmare.

23.SummaryEnglish: Tobe uses Pucca's Scooter to make a weapon to battle Garu.

24.SummaryEnglish: Tobe kidnaps Yani in order to lure Garu and Mio into a trap.

25.SummaryEnglish: Pucca becomes invisible and starts scaring the citizens.

26.SummaryEnglish: Tobe gets hit by lightning and becomes more powerful.

27.SummaryEnglish: Garu and Tobe get arrested and Pucca tries different ways of seeing Garu while he's in jail.

28.SummaryEnglish: Christmas comes to Sooga Village and everyone's presents are stolen by a stranger seeking revenge on an old nemesis.

29.SummaryEnglish: The northern lights go out at Iglooga Village and Garu must find a way to fix them before the snow beast can destroy the village.

30.SummaryEnglish: The citizens of Sooga Village line up to see Santa not knowing that it is really Tobe in disguise.

31.SummaryEnglish: Pucca and Ching enter a world where their friends are Wild West characters.

32.SummaryEnglish: The Vagabonds tried to make Pucca late in order to get their food free.

33.SummaryEnglish: Abyo steals a manual that Pucca created to make love ninja moves.

34.SummaryEnglish: Abyo shows off his moves until his face slips off of him.

35.SummaryEnglish: A Swiss girl falls in love with Garu until Pucca tries to save him.

36.SummaryEnglish: The Vagabonds take over a circus until Garu and Pucca play along.

37.SummaryEnglish: Muji's zombies kidnap the Baby New Year in order to ruin New Year's Eve.

38.SummaryEnglish: Muji steals the Endless supply of Noodles from Space Station Sooga.

39.SummaryEnglish: Ring Ring tries to sabotage Pucca's party after not inviting her.

40.SummaryEnglish: Pucca accidentally spins the gang on a merry-go-round back in time.

41.SummaryEnglish: Tobe forces the creator of Fortune cookies to create one that can destroy Garu.

42.SummaryEnglish: While playing in the ice, Tobe tries to make Garu sink in the icy water.

43.SummaryEnglish: Garu goes to the movies with Pucca but she wants him to watch a love story.

44.SummaryEnglish: The chefs go on strike and the village goes on a Ja Jang Noodle famine.

45.SummaryEnglish: The citizens have a costume dance party until Tobe and his gang try to crash it.

46.SummaryEnglish: Tobe gets hits by one of Cupid's arrows and falls in love with Chief.

47.SummaryEnglish: Ching tries to make Abyo her boyfriend until Muji kidnaps her.

48.SummaryEnglish: A famous celebrity tries to charm Pucca and Garu decides to help him.

49.SummaryEnglish: Garu gets a broken leg and is sent to the hospital.

50.SummaryEnglish: The citizens of Sooga enjoy a beach party until Muji tries to wreck it.

51.SummaryEnglish: Abyo becomes a superhero until he starts arresting the citizens.

52.SummaryEnglish: The Chefs create a singing contest as an ad for their restaurant.

53.SummaryEnglish: Tobe plans on destroying Garu while he's asleep.

54.SummaryEnglish: The Chefs of the Goh-Wong fight over a girl.

55.SummaryEnglish: Garu gives Pucca a bell in order to escape from her

56.SummaryEnglish: Muji challenges Garu in order to keep a Syrup geyser.

57.SummaryEnglish: Garu can't get an autograph until Pucca tries to get it for him.

58.SummaryEnglish: The boys create their own tree house and don't invite the girls.

59.SummaryEnglish: Garu goes to Spain for the running of the bulls until Tobe gets involved.

60.SummaryEnglish: Garu creates a clone and it becomes his own talking person.

61.SummaryEnglish: Pucca and the gang visit Tokyo, Japan.

62.SummaryEnglish: Tobe tricks Garu into taking tests for a Ninja License.

63.SummaryEnglish: Spicy food turns the gingerbread people into fire-breathing creatures.

64.SummaryEnglish: Ring Ring tries to sabotage Pucca's supermodeling career.

65.SummaryEnglish: Pucca and the Chefs search for Garu of the Jungle until Tobe tries to capture him.

66.SummaryEnglish: Stress-out Abyo heads toward Ssoso's temple for inner peace.

67.SummaryEnglish: Tobe travels inside Garu in order to defeat him.

68.SummaryEnglish: Puccahontas tries to help Garunimo in his tests.

69.SummaryEnglish: The chefs battle a Texan couple for their honor of the Goh-Wong.

70.SummaryEnglish: Pucca and Ring Ring are in a contest for Garu's attention.

71.SummaryEnglish: Garu and Tobe compete in the Olympic games.

72.SummaryEnglish: The gang tries to catch Mio to take him to the vet.

73.SummaryEnglish: An Australian man finds Garu and keeps him like a son.

74.SummaryEnglish: Pucca's creates a sweater for Garu to wear on his mountain climb.

75.SummaryEnglish: Muji tries to shave the Dugong's moustache until Pucca gets involved.

76.SummaryEnglish: Dada becomes a ladies man and Ring Ring loves him.

77.SummaryEnglish: Garu travels to deliver an urn by train until Tobe tries to steal it.

78.SummaryEnglish: Tobe tries to take over Holland with an automotive windmill.

1.SummaryEnglish: Ring Ring plans to become the most beautiful girl in Egypt.

2.SummaryEnglish: Master Soo bans Kung Fu and Marital Arts from the village.

3.SummaryEnglish: Tobe plans to defeat Garu in a court of law.

4.SummaryEnglish: Tobe plans to sink the Gigantic with Garu in it.

5.SummaryEnglish: Garu discovers that his day is happening over and over.

6.SummaryEnglish: Samba of Doom: Tobe plans to sabotage the Samba dance contest.

7.SummaryEnglish: Doga fish-naps all the merpeople of the ocean.

8.SummaryEnglish: Tobe seeks advice from Heil Kick Yu.

10.SummaryEnglish: The Vagabonds bring a plague of termites to the village

11.SummaryEnglish: Dada quits his job as a janitor and becomes a wrestler.

12.SummaryEnglish: The balance of Yin and Yang has gone screwy.

13.SummaryEnglish: Tex Lugie and Sloppy Sue return with an SUV factory.

14.SummaryEnglish: Garu's astral self travels to learn the secret of enlightenment.

15.SummaryEnglish: Doga moves in the Goh-wong and gives the chefs a hard time.

16.SummaryEnglish: The chefs have been kidnapped during a convention in Las Vegas.

17.SummaryEnglish: Secret Agent Abyo follows clues to the chefs' whereabouts.

18.SummaryEnglish: Abyo and the gang encounter the mastermind in the kidnappings.

19.SummaryEnglish: Ring Ring wants to have more merit badges than Pucca.

20.SummaryEnglish: Pucca gets a flu, and the soup that will cure her calls for lava peppers. While Ho is getting them, a fire goddess falls in love with him.

21.SummaryEnglish: A laundry accident causes Garu and Tobe to be stuck together.

22.SummaryEnglish: Garu travels to India to find Swami Soo until Pucca pursues him.

23.SummaryEnglish: Pucca is shocked to see Garu in love with Ring Ring until she finds out its Dada in a mask.

24.SummaryEnglish: Chief possesses the wise turtle's glasses, making her a genius so she can impress Tobe.

25.SummaryEnglish: Ching and Ring Ring battle as Cheerleaders.

26.SummaryEnglish: Tobe fires his ninjas until they go looking for another job.

27.SummaryEnglish: Kua returns with the chefs to find the essence of 1,000 moons.

28.SummaryEnglish: Abyo becomes a fashion model until Ching gets jealous.

29.SummaryEnglish: Muji creates a zombified Pucca bride.

30.SummaryEnglish: Pucca uses the full moon to release Garu's love side.

31.SummaryEnglish: Ring Ring splits herself from her "bad" side.

32.SummaryEnglish: The vagabonds try to steal cans from a food drive.

33.SummaryEnglish: Garu Hood must rescue the noodle bowl and Dada.

34.SummaryEnglish: Won falls in love with a Cuckoo bird and leaves with it but makes Ching feel weak and powerless.

35.SummaryEnglish: Both Santa and Doga get the wrong kind of batteries.

36.SummaryEnglish: Pucca and her friends become superheroes and battle Master Soo's brother Mel when he wants revenge on the village for forgetting about him.

37.SummaryEnglish: Ring Ring travels back to the past and erases Garu from history.

38.SummaryEnglish: Garu falls into a run-away magician's hat, leaving Pucca to chase it all over Sooga Village.

39.SummaryEnglish: Master Soo's brother Loo makes fun of his old age and steals his maidens from him.
